title: M4: Does domain specific NMT requiere pre-editing? (2)
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 30 minutes + 60 minuts of NMT engine training. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Choose a domain of particular interest in the course you are giving. Students should be able to search for a corpus in Opus (https://opus.nlpl.eu/) with the appropriate language combination, and train an NMT engine with MultiTraiNMT. It might also be of interest to ask students to test their pre-edited texts on the NMT engines trained by other students.
